mapper.insert: insert into subway_car_lib (city_code, subway_car_type_code, door_quantity, manufacturer_code, market_time, line_code, comment, create_user) values (#{cityCode}, #{subwayCarTypeCode}, #{doorQuantity}, #{manufacturerCode}, #{marketTime}, #{lineCode}, #{comment}, #{createUser})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from subway_car_lib sc
AND CONCAT_WS(',' , city_code , subway_car_type_code , door_quantity , manufacturer_code , market_time , line_code , comment ) Like #{advanceColumnLike}
